member.name: P:HubblePOS.Module.PaymentTerminalIntegration.GetAuthorizationDetailsAsyncRequest.OriginIntermediaryOperationCode
member.summary: Origin operation code. Identifies the newest transaction to be detailed (up to X (tipically 10) transactions will be detailed and this is the latest one). Should be a valid intermediary Operation Code received when MdP sent us a positive SaleAsyncResponse message (which is notified within a SaleResponseDataReceived or a RefundResponseDataReceived event) null or string.Empty are accepted when OriginApprovalDateTime is null. If OriginApprovalDateTime has value, this property should also be provided If NO OriginIntermediaryOperationCode nor OriginApprovaldateTime are provided, the last X transactions will be returned.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Module.PaymentTerminalIntegration.GetAuthorizationDetailsAsyncRequest.OriginApprovalDateTime
member.summary: DateTime (detailed up to seconds). Identifies the datetime of the oldest transaction to be detailed (up to X (tipically 10) transactions will be detailed and this is the first one). null is accepted when OriginIntermediaryOperationCode is empty. If OriginIntermediaryOperationCode has value, this should be empty If NO OriginIntermediaryOperationCode nor OriginApprovaldateTime are provided, the last X transactions will be returned.

member.summary: Generated STAN code for the requested transaction

member.summary: Authorizing center code (CCA). Valid values are 00 to 15

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Module.PaymentTerminalIntegration.GetCopyAsyncRequest.OriginIntermediaryOperationCode
member.summary: Operation Code. Identifies the transaction to be detailed. Should be a valid intermediary (i.e. redsys) Operation Code received when MdP sent us a positive SaleAsyncResponse or RefundAsyncResponse message (which is notified within a SaleResponseDataReceived or RefundResponseDataReceived event) When filled with null or string.Empty, the latest performed transaction details will be returned.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Module.PaymentTerminalIntegration.RefundAsyncRequest.IsSplitPayment
member.summary: Tells if the requested payment is a partial or full payment for the referred Document. Example: True for a document with total amount 10€, which is paid with cash and bank card (5€ + 5€, for example). Example: True for a document which is partially paid (document total 10€, but paid 7€ with bank card).

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Module.PaymentTerminalIntegration.IPaymentTerminalIntegration.ConnectionStatus
member.summary: It indicates whether the component is connected to the payment terminal.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Module.PaymentTerminalIntegration.IPaymentTerminalIntegration.PendingOperationToken
member.summary: It indicates the token is expected to receive from payment terminal. It is filled to request an operation, and only filled if it is empty. In launching the event reception, this is empty.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Module.PaymentTerminalIntegration.IPaymentTerminalIntegration.TraceLevel

member.name: M:HubblePOS.Module.PaymentTerminalIntegration.IPaymentTerminalIntegration.Disconnect
